long_description: Don't let biting bugs ruin your vacation. The ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Sandfly(TM) Jacket fends off pesky insects, breathes well and dries fast to keep you comfortable. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Lightweight polyester mini mesh fabric stretches, dries fast and allows cooling airflow to keep you comfortable while you're traveling. Reinforced shoulder panels stand up to abrasion from backpack straps. Elastic binding at the hem keeps the jacket snug around your waist so bugs won't get in. Flip up the hood for extra coverage; hood adjusts and still allows peripheral vision. 2 hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Sandfly(TM) Jacket has a standard fit.
short_description: Don't let biting bugs ruin your vacation. The ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Sandfly(TM) Jacket fends off pesky insects, breathes well and dries fast to keep you comfortable.
